member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.EthernetENC28
member.summary: An EthernetENC28 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.EthernetENC28.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.EthernetENC28.UseThisNetworkInterface

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.EthernetENC28.IsNetworkConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the cable is inserted into the module. Make sure to also check the NetworkUp property to verify network state.
